column1: This setting modifies the Breadcrumbs Type for the Search Engine only. It does not modify the Breadcrumbs on the store frontend. Choose 'Short' to make "Store > Subcategory 2 > Product" instead of "Store > Category > Subcategory 1 > Subcategory 2 > Product"
